pages.md:
# The Mode Dial

To select a shooting mode, rotate the dial until the icon for the desired mode aligns with the index.

!Mode Dial

| Mode                          | Description                                                                 |
|-------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| â‘  P (PROGRAM AE)              | Aperture and shutter speed can be adjusted using program shift.             |
| â‘¡ S (SHUTTER PRIORITY AE)     | Select for full control over camera settings, including aperture (M and A) and/or shutter speed (M and S). |
| A (APERTURE PRIORITY AE)      |                                                                             |
| M (MANUAL)                    |                                                                             |
| â‘¢ C1/C2/C3/C4/C5/C6           | Take pictures using previously-stored settings.                             |
| (CUSTOM 1/2/3/4/5/6)          |                                                                             |

> ðŸ’¡ **Note:**  
> Rotate the mode dial only after pressing the dial lock release to release the dial.
